LanguageData.DAS_AutoRemoveTooltip: When enabled, abandoned settlement tiles will be automatically removed without requiring manual removal.
LanguageData.DAS_AutoRemoveRespectCooldownTooltip: If enabled, auto-removal will wait for the cooldown period to expire before removing the tile. If disabled, tiles are removed immediately.
LanguageData.DAS_EnableCooldownTooltip: If enabled, abandoned tiles will remain blocked for a set number of days before becoming reusable.
LanguageData.DAS_CooldownSliderLabel: Cooldown before tiles are cleared: {0} days
LanguageData.DAS_CooldownSliderTooltip: Controls how many in-game days abandoned tiles will persist before being cleared.
LanguageData.DAS_CooldownInfo: Tiles are marked abandoned and cleared after that number of in-game days.
LanguageData.DAS_CooldownDisabledLabel: Cooldown disabled — tiles are removed immediately.
LanguageData.DAS_RemoveAbandonedTileDesc: Permanently remove this abandoned settlement from the map.
LanguageData.DAS_RemoveAbandonedTileConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this abandoned settlement tile? This cannot be undone.
